content:
A ammunition weighing 250 kilograms was found in the garden near one of the houses after the next shelling of the Russian army of the border village of Ruska Lozova.

About thisShe reported March 29State Emergency Service.

If the FAB-250 was found, the homes of peaceful residents would be significantly destroyed, and the worst thing, it could take people's lives or injure them.

Law enforcement officers provided the movement of the movement and, together with the rescuers, evacuated the residents of the surrounding areas.

The SES sappers were safely seized, transported to the liquidation site and neutralized.

BeforeThe Armyinform reported5 aviation missiles in Sumy region.
title: In Kharkiv, the Russian airbomble was neutralized
description: This was reported on March 29 by the State Emergency Service. If found ...
author: Army Inform
